data.actual_result: Audio is redirected to bottom phone speakers
data.expected_result: Audio continues to play from Bluetooth speaker
data.short_description: Audio redirected through phone speakers upon joining VC
data.steps_to_repro: - Connect to a Bluetooth speaker - Be playing music through your Bluetooth speaker - Join a Voice Channel while connected to your Bluetooth speaker - Resume playing the music (It’ll pause upon joining the Voice Channel)
